description: Building a social media platform with real-time features using Next.js, tRPC, and Socket.io. Implemented image optimization with ImageKit and designed scalable database architecture with Prisma and PostgreSQL.
Contributed to Talawa, an open-source project aimed at helping community organizations manage their members. Worked on frontend features and bug fixes.
Worked on building web solutions and gained hands-on experience with modern web development practices and team collaboration.
Intensive full-stack development program covering advanced concepts in web development, system design, and DevOps practices.
